snippet: If it's good, I did it, if it's bad, I had nothing to do with it.
abstract: If it's good, I did it, if it's bad, I had nothing to do with it.
lead_paragraph: Greg Sargent has been demanding that Mitt Romney be held accountable for two claims that he makes about jobs: (1) That Obama has been a job-destroyer (2) that he, Romney, created 100,000 jobs at Bain.
